title: Tenure of commission
context: ยง50-12 Tenure of commission. The terms of office of the members of the charter commission shall expire on the day after the election at which the proposed charter is submitted to the qualified electors of the county for approval, unless earlier terminated as provided in section 50-6. [L 1963, c 73, pt of ยง2; Supp, ยง143A-13; HRS ยง50-12]
